content: treble_crochet in top of turning chain 44 treble_crochet row 32 chain 4 turn trc3tog decrease made treble_crochet in ea treble_crochet across treble_crochet in top of turning chain 42 treble_crochet row 33-42 continue in pattern working trc3tog decreases as established row 43-57 continue in pattern but substitute trc2tog decreases instead of trc3tog at end of row 57 there should be 7 or 8 treble_crochet if necessary decrease on next row by decrease to end with 7 sts row 58 chain 1 turn single_crochet in ea treble_crochet across 7 single_crochet fasten_off and weave in ends finishing consult care instructions on yarn ball band and if appropriate damp-block scarf/shawlette by stretching it out flat on thick towels cover with damp towel and leave to dry in a place with good air circulation copyright 2017 2008 kathy north www ravelry com/designers/kathy-north for personal or charity use only do not duplicate pattern for commercial purposes 2
